data.author: Ella Woodword
data.quote: When life gives you Monday, dip it in glitter and sparkle all day.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

data.author: Van Gogh
data.quote: If you hear a voice within you say ‘you cannot paint,’ then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.

data.author: Michael Jordan
data.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.

data.author: Mother Teresa
data.quote: The miracle is not that we do this work, but that we are happy to do it.
